name: Saint Catherine's Monastery
uniques: Must have an owned [Mount Sinai] within [8] tiles
[+2 Gold, +2 Culture, +1 Faith] from [Dyes] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Gold, +2 Culture, +2 Faith] from [Incense] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Culture] from all [Faith] buildings <in cities with at least [3] [Followers of this Religion]>
quote: 'The only place where one can go to experience the presence of God is Mount Sinai: here is where Moses received the tablets of the law, here is where the cloud rested on the Mount, here is where the fire spoke and the God of Israel was heard talking to Moses; the entire history of Israel begins at Sinai; if we seek to find God here in Sinai, what are we looking for? What we seek is the same God that Moses met on top of this mountain in the fire and the cloud. We are looking for the same God that spoke to Moses, the same God that led the people of Israel through the Red Sea and to the other side of the Jordan.' - Hans KÃ¼ng

name: Saint Mark's Basilica
quote: 'It is the most splendid city I have ever seen, and the one which governs itself the most wisely.' - Philippe de Commines

name: Saint Peter's Basilica
uniques: [+2 Faith] <after adopting [Piety] and [All] it's Policy's Branches>
Double quantity of [Marble] produced <in this city>
quote: 'From the dome of St. Peter's one can see every notable object in Rome... He can see a panorama that is varied, extensive, beautiful to the eye, and more illustrious in history than any other in Europe.' - Mark Twain

name: The Temple Of Saint Sava
uniques: Gain a free [Cathedral] in this city
quote: 'This great temple is not only a treasure of Serbia but also of the Orthodox world. Russia is honored to have contributed to its mosaics, which reflect the unity of our faith.' - Vladimir Putin

name: Cathedral Of Christ The Saviour
uniques: Heals [25] damage if it kills a unit
quote: 'Pain and suffering are always inevitable for a large intelligence and a deep heart.' - Fyodor Dostoevsky

name: Mont Saint Michel
uniques: All newly-trained [Great Prophet] units [in this city] receive the [Devout] promotion
quote: 'Church and State, Soul and Body, God and Man, are all one at Mont Saint Michel, and the business of all is to fight, each in his own way, or to stand guard for each other.' - Henry Adams

name: Saint Basil's Cathedral
uniques: [+3 Food, +3 Production, +3 Culture] from [Tundra] tiles [in this city]
quote: 'One had a twisted design, red, on a green ground; another, all prickly angles, yellow and black; a third was ornamented with scales of blue and crimson; a fourth was in quarters like a melon.' - Katharine Blanche Guthrie

name: Vardzia
uniques: Must have an owned [Mountain] within [5] tiles
[+3 Faith, +2 Culture, +1 Science] from [Mountain] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] per [2] population [in this city]
quote: 'Today, the site is an impressive testament to Georgian strength and power, and a lasting monument to its history. The preservation of much of the artwork near the church is done through the Courtauld Institute of Art in conjunction with the National Agency for Cultural Heritage Preservation of Georgia and Tbilisi State Academy of Arts. It remains on the UNESCO World Heritage list and is a common location for tourists of all persuasions.' - Michael Godwin

name: Kyiv Pechersk Lavra
uniques: Must have an owned [Mountain] within [5] tiles
[+4 Faith, +3 Culture] from [Mountain] tiles [in this city]
[+4 Culture, +3 Faith] from [Hill] tiles [in this city]

name: Santa Maria delle Grazie
uniques: Must have an owned [Mountain] within [2] tiles
quote: 'Santa Maria delle Grazie is a treasure trove of art and history. The church is steeped in tradition and has been a center of pilgrimage and devotion in Milan for centuries. The mural 'The Last Supper' is just one of the many works of art that can be found within its walls. I was moved by the beauty and power of the painting, and by the significance of its place within the broader history of Italy and the church.' - Michelle Obama

name: Wat Pho
quote: 'Wat Pho is an incredible example of the beauty and reverence of Buddhist architecture and art. The massive reclining Buddha statue is a true marvel of engineering and craftsmanship, and the temple itself is a true testament to the power of religious devotion. The experience of visiting Wat Pho was truly unforgettable, and I hope that others will have the opportunity to visit the temple and experience its beauty for themselves.' - Richard Branson

name: Great Bath
uniques: Must have an owned [Flood plains] within [2] tiles
quote: 'Yet in this captious and intenible sieve I still pour in the waters of my love And lack not to lose still: thus, Indian-like,Religious in mine error, I adore The sun, that looks upon his worshipper, But knows of him no more.' - William Shakespeare
